1.0.1.name: cpp-generator
1.0.1.description: C++ File generator for Atom editor
1.0.1.author: Vidur Murali <vidur.murali+atom@gmail.com>

metaAuthor.description: The author's name to be used in the file's comment header.

metaDateFormat.description: The date in the file's comment header is formatted using this string. Uses Moment.js' formats available [here](http://momentjs.com/docs/#/displaying/)

useSelectedFilepath.description: If set, the generator's input prompt directory will be set to the same directory as the currently selected file. Otherwise, will it will be set to the project's root directory. This is a bit of an obtuse description, just try it out and you will see.

readme:
# cpp-generator package

Generates a C++ `.cpp` and `.hpp` file.

## Usage:

  - Open the command palette
  - Select "Generate C++ Files"
  - Enter the path and Class name you want

The generator should have created the two C++ files at the path you chose.

## Configuration:

You can configure the Author Name and date format in the Settings panel.
